headline: FactSet Barclays Deal Deepens Bank Analytics Integration And Recurring Revenue Potential
summary: FactSet Research Systems (NYSE:FDS) announced a multiyear collaboration with Barclays to power advanced analytics solutions for financial clients. The arrangement will integrate FactSet's analytics and technology into Barclays' workflows for institutional customers. This agreement adds a large global bank to FactSet's roster of enterprise partners. FactSet positions itself as a core data and analytics provider for investment professionals, and this new Barclays collaboration is aligned with...
